branchCategory.name: 12-REA
branchCategory.description: <P>Series 12-REA provides the features needed to allow rapid transfer which virtually eliminates shock impact.  12-REA is available in 5 bore sizes from 25mm to 63mm and strokes up to 1000mm.  It also has a specially treated cylinder tube exterior.  After inspection, products are blown with high purity air (clean bench/class M3.5) in a clean environment.  Products are sealed and shipped in anti-static double bags.</P>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, 12-REA, Sine, Accelerating & Decelarating Clean Room, Magnetically Coupled
branchItem.description: <P>Series 12-REA provides the features needed to allow rapid transfer which virtually eliminates shock impact.  12-REA is available in 5 bore sizes from 25mm to 63mm and strokes up to 1000mm.  It also has a specially treated cylinder tube exterior.  After inspection, products are blown with high purity air (clean bench/class M3.5) in a clean environment.  Products are sealed and shipped in anti-static double bags.</P>
